name: InventoryUnitSw
description: IM Inventory Unit Software resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: swId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unique identifier of a Software unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: swVersion
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Version identifier of the software unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: salesUniqueId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date of Manufacture of inventory unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: swInstallationTime
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date and time when the software installation process ended and the sotware was installed

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: swActivationTime
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date and time when the software was activated

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: swStatus
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Status of the SW unit (e.g. installed, archived)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nEList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitNE(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hWList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitHw(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: lICList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitLic(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: mFunction
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the DN of related ManagedFunction
